attributes.action: Rescind on all grants given to local councils under Regulations 2012
attributes.background: Stop funding local councils from closing streets as they are not abiding by the laws that are covered in the 2012 No. ROAD TRAFFIC, ENGLAND. They have also ignored the basic Human Rights of elderly people – the infirmed and Disabled drivers in the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what grants and regulations you're asking to be withdrawn. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
